item.title: Explore
item.description: Nicely video drive me back to the past Even drive me to some impossible angle or unseen area Figure out how to screenshot and export them ^^ export: Go to SideQuest Click the File icon on the top tool bar Clike the Oculus icon below Then you will see the screenshots you took and click save icon, find a place on your computer:) Notes: Ways to update the pages:
